Returns: A framework cancellation signal object, or null on platform versions prior to Jellybean.
getCancellationSignalObject().Description: Gets the framework @B_android#os#CancellationSignal_E@ associated with this object. Framework support for cancellation signals was added in @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#JELLY_BEAN_E@ so this method will always return null on older versions of the platform.

cancel().Description: Cancels the operation and signals the cancellation listener. If the operation has not yet started, then it will be canceled as soon as it does.

CancellationSignal().Description: Creates a cancellation signal, initially not canceled.

Throws: if the operation has been canceled.
throwIfCanceled().Description: Throws @B_android#support#v4#os#OperationCanceledException_E@ if the operation has been canceled.

Returns: True if the operation has been canceled.
isCanceled().Description: Returns true if the operation has been canceled.

ClassDesc: Static library support version of the framework's https:##developer#android#com@B_android#os#CancellationSignal_E@. Used to write apps that run on platforms prior to Android 4.1. See the framework SDK documentation for a class overview.
